mapper.sql: ID as id, CONFIRM_TIME as confirmTime, CONTENT as content, CREATE_TIME as createTime, DESCRIPTION as description, ERROR_CODE as errorCode, ERROR_MESSAGE as errorMessage, SHOP_ID as shopId, SYNC_COUNTER as syncCounter, SYNC_STATUS as syncStatus, SYNC_TIME as syncTime, TID as tid, MSG_TYPE as msgType, VERSION as version, SHOP_CODE as shopCode, CONFIRM_ID as confirmId, EXT1 as ext1, EXT2 as ext2
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_send_so_msg ( id, CONFIRM_TIME , CONTENT , CREATE_TIME , DESCRIPTION , ERROR_CODE , ERROR_MESSAGE , SHOP_ID , SYNC_COUNTER , SYNC_STATUS , SYNC_TIME , TID , MSG_TYPE , VERSION , SHOP_CODE , CONFIRM_ID , EXT1 , EXT2 ) VALUES ( #{id,javaType=java.lang.Long,jdbcType=BIGINT} , #{confirmTime,javaType=java.util.Date,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} , #{content,javaType=String,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} , #{createTime,javaType=java.util.Date,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} , #{description,javaType=String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{errorCode,javaType=String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{errorMessage,javaType=String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{shopId,javaType=Long,jdbcType=BIGINT} , #{syncCounter,javaType=Integer,jdbcType=INTEGER} , #{syncStatus,javaType=Integer,jdbcType=INTEGER} , #{syncTime,javaType=java.util.Date,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} , #{tid,javaType=Long,jdbcType=BIGINT} , #{msgType,javaType=String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{version,javaType=Integer,jdbcType=INTEGER} , #{shopCode,javaType=String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{confirmId,javaType=String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{ext1,javaType=String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{ext2,javaType=String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.update: UPDATE t_send_so_msg SET CONFIRM_TIME = #{confirmTime,javaType=java.util.Date,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} , CONTENT = #{content,javaType=String,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} , CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,javaType=java.util.Date,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} , DESCRIPTION = #{description,javaType=String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , ERROR_CODE = #{errorCode,javaType=String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , ERROR_MESSAGE = #{errorMessage,javaType=String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , SHOP_ID = #{shopId,javaType=Long,jdbcType=BIGINT} , SYNC_COUNTER = #{syncCounter,javaType=Integer,jdbcType=INTEGER} , SYNC_STATUS = #{syncStatus,javaType=Integer,jdbcType=INTEGER} , SYNC_TIME = #{syncTime,javaType=java.util.Date,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} , TID = #{tid,javaType=Long,jdbcType=BIGINT} , MSG_TYPE = #{msgType,javaType=String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , VERSION = #{version,javaType=Integer,jdbcType=INTEGER} , SHOP_CODE = #{shopCode,javaType=String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , CONFIRM_ID = #{confirmId,javaType=String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , EXT1 = #{ext1,javaType=String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , EXT2 = #{ext2,javaType=String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} WHERE ID = #{id}
